app.name: $BRAND$
app.short_description: Allows Zendesk to manage tickets from $BRAND$
app.long_description: $BRAND$ flows can open tickets through different services allowing human agents to take over communication with a contact. This app allows your $BRAND$ flows to open Zendesk Support tickets.
app.installation_instructions:
1. Login at [$BRAND$](https://$DOMAIN$) and go to your account settings page.
2. From the menu at the top right, select *Add Ticketing Service*.
3. Select *Zendesk* and enter your Zendesk subdomain.
4. Click submit and follow the instructions provided.
